data.text: Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa ɠa gè lɔɔɠuzu è ʋoluʋɛ,
Ɗa-lelebodai zu, ùnmɔɔ, è fìe!
Ɠɛ bɛ̀ ga fasai, nii é bɛ̀ ga dɔ̀ɔɠuzuʋɛ,
Ee, nà-GALAGI, kìzo nu ɲɔi yeei ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ Màliɠii, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa ɠa è ga nà-kitogi!
kaite dèe ɠoozu gè ʋoluzeini è ʋa,
Nà nui ma mɔinmɔin gaazu ga laavɔɔ anii,
Dàaʋɛ laave ga ɗa-maamusɛi,
Mina pìli ya pɔ̀lɔzaɠa siɛgi zu,
Mazɔlɔɔ nɔ̀un sili nuiti ta sùɠulazu,
ti ɠɛ ma: «GALA ge ɠɛlɛa ba,
Ee, GALA, mina maaɠooza nɔ̀un ba!
Ti unfe, ti zuwuɠaaleʋe,
Nɔ̀un nà, kìgi logɛ è ʋa yeenɔpɛ.
Dàaʋɛ ɠa ɗa-lelebo fai wo,
Nà liizu ga luɠɔʋelei, ɗa-vɔnifaamai ʋɔ,
Ee, GALA, è kàlani, é zo nà-doungo ziɛgi zu ma,
Anɛɛ ɓalaa gè wɔlɔzaɠa pa, nɔ̀ungi ɠole,
Ee, GALA, ɗa-lelebogi ɠwɛ ge la ba,
È ʋoluɠulai zeiʋɛ gi ma, ga kidaaʋiligiti ta maanɔɠɔiti.
Ɗa nà-unfemai ve zèa mɔnɔ,
Nɔ̀un, nà lati niina, gè è maamusɛ ga kɔnigi wooi,
Dàkɔlɔgiti ta è maamusɛ,
Folo-o-folo, nɛ̀gi ɠa ɠɛ ɗa-lelebo fai wosu,
